job title: Big Data Consultant / Big Data Engineer / Hadoop Developer / Tera data
job description:
Sr Big Data Consultant

Location: Irving, TX

Duration: Long Term

IT specialist with Oracle BI, Analytics and Teradata/Hadoop experience. • 5 or more years of IT development work experience (end-to-end design, development) for Datawarehouse, BI Reporting and Data Analytics systems. • 5 or more years of strong Dataware housing, BI & Analytics experience using Oracle 11g Fusion middleware software stack • 4 or more years of hands on database work experience in using (Oracle 12c, 11g, 10g, Exadata, Teradata, Informatica, Netezza etc.) • 2 or more years of hands on work experience in Oracle 12c database and Fusion middleware software stack • 2 or more years of work experience in using Hadoop technology echo systems (Amazon EMR / Cloudera / Hortonworks) • 1 or more years of hands on work experience in agile, dev/ops, AWS cloud environment. • Hands on experience using Oracle SQL and PL/SQL to be able to use new features and advance analytics functions available in oracle 11g and 12c. • Strong Datawarehouse concepts and fundamentals.

Thanks & regards,

Kumar Beeram

Resource Development Manager

Tel: 972-427-1950

Email: kumar@infovision.com

Website: www.infovision.com
